detail_desc: Round-necked T-shirts in soft organic cotton jersey.
Swim shorts in a patterned weave with an elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly, side pockets and short legs with slits in the sides. Soft mesh inner shorts.
Soft, non-wired lace bra with removable inserts that give the bust a natural shape and light support. Adjustable shoulder straps, wide elasticated hem and a hook-and-eye fastening.
Short 5-pocket skirt in cotton corduroy with a zip fly and button.
Straight-cut T-shirt in soft, airy jersey made from a silk and cotton blend with a round neck.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a motif on the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Sandals with adjustable hook and loop tabs at the top, a loop at the back and patterned soles.
T-shirts in soft organic cotton jersey with lapped shoulders and a straight hem.
Jacket in sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood, zip down the front, side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Long cardigan in a soft knit containing some wool with long sleeves, high slits in the sides and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. No buttons. The polyester content of the cardigan is recycled.
Jumper in cable-knit cotton with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Long-sleeved cardigan in a fine-knit viscose blend with a sheen. V-neck, pearly buttons down the front and wide ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Fine-knit socks in a soft cotton blend with anti-slip protectors.
Jumper in a soft, fine cotton knit with a round neck, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Wide jumper knitted in a soft cotton blend with a ribbed turtle neck, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Fleece sports top with a funnel collar, zip at the top and long raglan sleeves. Zip at one side and elastication at the back of the hem.
Wide hairband in cotton jersey with a twisted detail.
Jumper in a superstretch, fluffy knit with a round neckline, 3/4-length balloon sleeves that are puffed at the top, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Leather loafers with a decorative tab and seam at the front. Leather linings and insoles. Heel approx. 2 cm.
5-pocket shorts in washed, stretch denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button, and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Short-sleeved top in jersey crêpe with an opening at the top, a round neckline with pleats and a button at the front.

Long dress in airy, patterned, crinkled chiffon with a V-neck and small stand-up collar with narrow ties at the front. Long, wide sleeves with narrow, buttoned cuffs, a smocked seam at the waist and a gently gathered, softly draping skirt. Lined.

Ankle-length, seamless yoga tights in fast-drying fabric with a wide waistband and gathers at the knees for increased mobility. Wide ribbing at the hems. The tights are designed with the minimum number of seams for a more comfortable fit.
Slim-fit jeans in washed stretch denim with an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and press-stud, front and back pockets, and narrow hems.
Short-sleeved blouse in an airy weave with a round neckline and short slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Jacket in washed denim with a collar and buttons down the front. Flap chest pockets with a button, side pockets and buttoned cuffs.
Cigarette trousers in soft viscose jersey with an elasticated waist, side pockets and tapered legs.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a low waist, narrow ties at the sides and a gathered seam at the back.
Shirt dress in a crêpe weave with a collar, button placket and short dolman sleeves. Yoke with a pleat at the back, and slits in the sides. Unlined.
Long-sleeved blouse in a patterned viscose weave with a V-neck, buttons down the front and long, wide sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Unlined.
Pyjama shorts in soft, patterned jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist with a small frill trim at the top.

Padded parka in woven fabric with a matt finish. Pile-lined hood with a faux fur trim and drawstring, a zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front and a drawstring at the waist and hem. Flap front pockets with a concealed press-stud, and inner ribbing at the cuffs. Lined.
Jumper in loose-knit tape yarn with a slightly wider neckline, dropped shoulders, long sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups and a rounded hem.Slightly longer at the back.
T-shirt in soft cotton and modal jersey with a wide neckline, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, and a rounded hem.
Cotton jersey top with a print motif on the front and a gently rounded hem. Short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.
Tops in soft cotton jersey with a print motif, long sleeves and narrow ribbing around the neckline.
Lightweight sports boxer shorts in fast-drying functional fabric with flatlock seams, an elasticated waist and slightly longer legs.
Small bag with a narrow shoulder strap and a zip at the top. Lined. Size 16x22 cm.
Jumper in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with dropped shoulders, long, embroidered sleeves, and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Dress in soft, organic cotton jersey with flutter sleeves and an elasticated seam at the waist with decorative gathers.
Suede shoulder bag with a zip at the top, one outer compartment with a press-stud, one inner compartment, and an adjustable, detachable shoulder strap. Cotton lining.
Padded Alice band in grained imitation leather lined with velvet. Width 2-4 cm.
Jumper in a soft, textured-knit cotton blend with long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Nylon jacket with a detachable, jersey-lined hood, zip down the front with a chin guard, zipped side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Jersey lining.
Fully lined bikini with lace. Triangle top with a decorative ring at the front, adjustable ties at the back of the neck and a plastic fastener at the back. Bottoms with decorative rings at the sides.
Cold shoulder jumper in a ribbed cotton blend with a small, ribbed stand-up collar, long raglan sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Top in soft sweatshirt fabric with an interactive appliqué on the front and jersey-lined, wrapover hood. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a wide waistband.
Blouse in an airy, patterned weave with a small, frilled collar and opening at the top with a tie. Long sleeves with a tie and frill trim at the cuffs, and smocking at the hem.

T-shirt in hard-washed slub cotton jersey with a slightly wider, raw-edge neckline and seam centre back. Short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, and a rounded hem with slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Cropped, off-the-shoulder top in a cotton weave with smocking at the top and hem, and short sleeves with narrow elastication.
Short-sleeved top in jersey with sewn-in turn-ups on the sleeves.
Jacquard-knit jumper in a soft cotton blend containing some wool with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Pyjamas in printed cotton jersey. T-shirt top with a round neckline. Shorts with an elasticated waist.

Soft, non-wired bra in lace and microfibre with lined, triangular cups that give the bust a natural shape and light support. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps, a wide lace trim at the hem and a wide strap with three pairs of hooks and eyes at the back.

Shopper in imitation leather with details in real suede. Two handles at the top and concealed ties inside the short sides. One spacious, zipped outer compartment and a small inner compartment. Studs on the base. Unlined. Size 9.5x31x33.5 cm.
Chino shorts in airy seersucker with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, side pockets and fake welt pockets with a button at the back.
Set with six metal hair clips and 20 hair elastics without metal clips. Size of hair clips 4 cm.
Sleeveless romper suit in soft, patterned cotton jersey with narrow shoulder straps and frill-trimmed elastication at the top, both front and back.
Hat in felted wool with a band. Width of brim 9 cm.
Short, sleeveless dress in sturdy jersey with a low-cut back, seam at the waist and flared skirt. The polyester content of the dress is partly recycled.
Lightly padded sleep bag in soft, patterned jersey with a jersey lining. The sleep bag is designed for indoor use only.
Sunglasses with plastic frames and UV-protective, tinted lenses.
Fully lined swimsuit with a print motif on the front, a round neckline and narrow shoulder straps that cross at the back.
Sleeveless dress in jersey with a seam at the waist and flared skirt.
Fully lined swimsuit with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and decorative lacing with shimmering metallic plastic beads at the sides.
Jumper in a soft rib knit with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Round-necked T-shirt in soft slub cotton jersey with a text print on the front.
Cotton canvas trainers with elasticated lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Fabric linings and insoles and fluted rubber soles.
Metal chain bracelet with shimmering metallic pendants in plastic. Adjustable length.
Cap in woven fabric with an adjustable plastic fastener at the back.

Jumpsuit in soft, patterned cotton jersey with a round neckline and short butterfly sleeves. Concealed press-studs at the top of the back, an elasticated seam at the waist with a decorative bow at the front, and side pockets.
Knee-length shorts in sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated, drawstring waist, side pockets and an open back pocket.

Long dress in a viscose weave with a round neckline and an opening with a concealed button at the back of the neck. Long, wide raglan sleeves, smocking at the waist and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Unlined.

Short sports shorts in fast-drying functional fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, mesh key pocket in the waistband and short slits at the hems. The polyester content of the shorts is partly recycled.
Shoulder bag in braided paper straw with a flap and concealed press-stud. Lined. Size 8x17x22 cm.
Slim-fit trousers in soft, superstretch twill with a zip fly and button, fake front pockets, real back pockets and slim legs with narrow hems.
Fitted, long-sleeved top in soft, ribbed cotton jersey with a V-neck and buttons at the top. Gathers in the sides for best fit over the tummy.
5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in stretch denim with a high waist, zip fly and button and wide legs. The cotton content of the jeans is partly recycled.
Leggings in printed cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
